briefdescription.para: Structure for bulk retrieval of object ids, attribute and values for each object-type. Key will be used in case of object-types not having object-ids.
Structure for attribute capabilities per operation.
Get maximum number of attributes for an object type.

parameterdescription.para: Maximum number of attribute for an object type

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error

briefdescription.para: Get the number of objects present in SAI. Deprecated for backward compatibility.

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error

memberdef.argsstring: (_In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ sai_object_type_t object_type, _Inout_ uint32_t *object_count, _Inout_ sai_object_key_t *object_list)
memberdef.name: sai_get_object_key

briefdescription.para: Get the number of and list of object keys present in SAI if enough large list provided, otherwise get the number of object keys only.

parameterdescription.para: List of SAI objects or keys

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, SAI_STATUS_BUFFER_OVERFLOW if list size insufficient, failure status code on error

memberdef.argsstring: (_In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ sai_object_type_t object_type, _In_ uint32_t object_count, _In_ const sai_object_key_t *object_key, _Inout_ uint32_t *attr_count, _Inout_ sai_attribute_t **attr_list, _Inout_ sai_status_t *object_statuses)
memberdef.name: sai_bulk_get_attribute

briefdescription.para: Get the bulk list of valid attributes for a given list of object keys.

detaileddescription.para: Only valid attributes for an object are returned.

parameterdescription.para: List of attr_count. Caller passes the number of attribute allocated in. Callee returns with the actual number of attributes filled in. If the count is less than needed, callee fills with the needed count and do not fill the attributes. Callee also set the corresponding status to SAI_STATUS_BUFFER_OVERFLOW.

List of attributes for every object. Caller is responsible for allocating and freeing buffer for the attributes. For list based attribute, e.g., s32list, objlist, callee should assume the caller has not allocated the memory for the list and should only to fill the count but not list. Then, caller can use corresponding get_attribute to get the list.

Status for each object. If the object does not exist, callee sets the corresponding status to SAI_STATUS_INVALID_OBJECT_ID. If the allocated attribute count is not large enough, set the status to SAI_STATUS_BUFFER_OVERFLOW.

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error

memberdef.argsstring: (_In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ sai_object_type_t object_type, _In_ sai_attr_id_t attr_id, _Out_ sai_attr_capability_t *attr_capability)
memberdef.name: sai_query_attribute_capability

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error

memberdef.argsstring: (_In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ sai_object_type_t object_type, _In_ sai_attr_id_t attr_id, _Inout_ sai_s32_list_t *enum_values_capability)
memberdef.name: sai_query_attribute_enum_values_capability

briefdescription.para: Query an enum attribute (enum or enum list) list of implemented enum values.

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, SAI_STATUS_BUFFER_OVERFLOW if list size insufficient, failure status code on error

briefdescription.para: Query statistics capability for statistics bound at object level.

parameterdescription.para: List of implemented enum values, and the statistics modes (bit mask) supported per value

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, SAI_STATUS_BUFFER_OVERFLOW if lists size insufficient, failure status code on error

memberdef.argsstring: (_In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ sai_object_type_t object_type, _In_ uint32_t object_count, _In_ const sai_object_key_t *object_key, _In_ uint32_t number_of_counters, _In_ const sai_stat_id_t *counter_ids, _In_ sai_stats_mode_t mode, _Inout_ sai_status_t *object_statuses, _Out_ uint64_t *counters)
memberdef.name: sai_bulk_object_get_stats

parameterdescription.para: Number of objects to get the stats
Number of counters in the array
Specifies the array of counter ids
Array of status for each object. Length of the array should be object_count. Should be looked only if API return is not SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS.
Array of resulting counter values. Length of counters array should be object_count*number_of_counters. Counter value of I object and J counter_id = counter[I*number_of_counters + J]

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error

memberdef.argsstring: (_In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ sai_object_type_t object_type, _In_ uint32_t object_count, _In_ const sai_object_key_t *object_key, _In_ uint32_t number_of_counters, _In_ const sai_stat_id_t *counter_ids, _In_ sai_stats_mode_t mode, _Inout_ sai_status_t *object_statuses)
memberdef.name: sai_bulk_object_clear_stats

parameterdescription.para: Number of objects to get the stats
Number of counters in the array
Specifies the array of counter ids
Array of status for each object. Length of the array should be object_count. Should be looked only if API return is not SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS.

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error

memberdef.argsstring: (_In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ sai_object_type_t object_type, _In_ uint32_t attr_count, _In_ const sai_attribute_t *attr_list, _Out_ sai_object_stage_t *stage)
memberdef.name: sai_query_object_stage

briefdescription.para: Query the HW stage of an attribute for the specified object type.

parameterdescription.para: HW stage of the attributes. Length of the array should be attr_count. Caller must allocate the buffer.

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error

briefdescription.para: This module defines SAI APIs for bulk retrieval for each object-type.
